ygData.subject: Re: A Question on Stats...
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe that there is a diminishing return, somebody quoted one of the Verant programmers on another board a while back that gave as an example that the mana
ygData.messageBody:
I believe that there is a diminishing return, somebody quoted one of the
Verant programmers on another board a while back that gave as an example
that the mana boost from going to 200 WIS from 190 was not as much as going
from 100WIS to 110. I believe that the same rule applies to all
stats...........

Dweezeman Dourbough, 30th level human cleric, E'Ci
Zukukuk Bonecrusher, 23rd level troll warrior, E'Ci

Clay Armstrong
Vice President Software Development
Travel Technologies Group
claya@...
(214) 346-4684


----- Original Message -----
From: Kevin Dailey <Kevin_Dailey@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 9:58 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] A Question on Stats...


> From: Kevin Dailey <Kevin_Dailey@...>
>
> A question about stats...Does the law of diminishing returns come into
> play with our stats? Specifically, do we get less of a return on stats
> the higher they go? My agility is currently 141, and my dexterity is
> 129...should I continue to try to find stat increasing items, or will it
> matter at all if I have 5 or 6 more agi than I do now? In fact, does it
> matter very much after 100?
>
> Just curious, that's all :)
>
> Saidinn Witchwood
>
> >
